QAData.question: Who won between Aston Villa and West Ham United on Sun, 22 Oct 2023 15:30:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Aston Villa won 4–1 over West Ham United on Sun, 22 Oct 2023 15:30:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Kurt Zouma has the least touches (30) of any outfield player.
Jarrod Bowen completed the most dribbles (4) in the match.
Edson Álvarez committed a foul leading to a penalty for Aston Villa.
Douglas Luiz was Player of the Match with a rating of 9.3.
Boubacar Kamara completed the most passes (68) in the match.
Boubacar Kamara lost the most duels (9) in the match.
